body:
[Find out more about counselling](https://www.counselling-directory.org.uk/separation.html)

Relate has a [free online chat service](https://www.relate.org.uk/relationship-help/talk-someone/live-chat-counsellor). Sessions last around 25 minutes.

Relate also has a [telephone service](https://www.relate.org.uk/relationship-help/talk-someone/telephone-counselling) that costs Â£55 per hour.

[Getting it right for children](https://click.clickrelationships.org/content/parenting-apart/course-getting-it-right-for-children/) is a free programme which uses real life situations to show how things can go wrong - and how you can do them better.
heading: Getting emotional support resources
